GPT_response.title: Advertiser Exodus and Financial Losses at Elon Musk's X
GPT_response.background: Elon Musk's social media company, X (formerly Twitter Inc.), is facing a significant financial setback. Due to Musk's support of an antisemitic post on the platform, major brands such as Walt Disney and Warner Bros. Discovery have decided to pause their advertising campaigns on the rebranded site. As a result, X is projected to lose up to $75 million in advertising revenue by the end of the year.
GPT_response.summary: Elon Musk's social media platform, X, is experiencing an exodus of advertisers after Musk's endorsement of an antisemitic post. Major brands including Walt Disney and Warner Bros. Discovery have temporarily halted their marketing campaigns on the site. The expected loss in advertising revenue for X by the end of the year is estimated to be around $75 million.
